title: Email fails to be processed due to user mismatch
content:
The user receives the following email notification:

We could not process your email. The senderâ€™s email address doesn't match the email address of the user who received the original email. Emails that were forwarded from other email addresses can't be processed.

To create, track, or update a request, log in to the Service Portal.

Cause

The sender of the email and the user in the email's token don't match. This might occur if a user forwarded the email containing a token to someone else.

Solution

None.

Contact Support if the problem persists for multiple users.
